import React,{useState} from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; function SearchWin() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const active = useSelector(state => state.activeSearch); const showSearch = () => { dispatch({ type: 'SHOW_HIDE_SEARCH', activeSearch: !active }); if (!active) document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; else document.body.style.overflow = 'unset'; } const [type,setType] = useState(null); return (
